QuestData.Title: Fiery Tongue, Fragile Feet
QuestData.Description: I was kicking the water for fun again when one of those vicious crocolisks lunged out to try to bite my foot off! Rude! I have proceeded to rest my weary soles a few feet farther from the water, but I already look back on my water-kicking days longingly.$B$BWould you be so kind as to kill a crocolisk or eight for me? I assure you they deserve it for frightening me though.
